reviewText: Excellent DVD on Islam given by a x-Islam believer, who is now a Christian.  Highly recommended
Sam Shamoun is well acquainted with Islam and its history.  He is honest and straight forward.  Islam is a challenge for the West that needs to be faced.
Sam does a thorough job of laying the groundwork for Islamic belief. Every person who wants to understand Islam from a middle easterner's perspective needs to have this as part of their library.
